com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.util

Class BoundedLinkedHashMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<K,V>
        • java.util.LinkedHashMap
          • com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.util.BoundedLinkedHashMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map
    Deprecated. 
    as of 5.7 create your own class that extends LinkedHashMap and implement LinkedHashMap.removeEldestEntry(java.util.Map.Entry<K, V>) to enforce a maximum number of entries.

    public class BoundedLinkedHashMap
extends java.util.LinkedHashMap
    Class BoundedLinkedHashMap is a bounded LinkedHashMap. The bound is the maximum number of entries the BoundedLinkedHashMap can contain.
    Since:
    4.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
